page.title: 07The Arabian stud ii
page.content: The stud was started in{1966}by {Michael Pitt-Rivers.}It has{40 acres of land and the horses get plenty of exercise. These horses are bought for many things-{sport,hunting,}as a{pet}and sometimes for ploughing.The horses al- together have won more than{3,000 {rossetes}. Miss Booth and{3 others}help with the horses and they have{one weekend off a {month }and{1 day off/week. The horses eat much food_{Bran,hay, {grass,nuts, micronized barley and {sugar beet.}The Arabs eat less than most horses but the food is expensive. They also need extra {copper}in their food. Altogether I thought the horses were well looked after. {(AUTHORS:P.Harry,C.Jackson)}
